backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with employee, attendance, and monthly summary types plus comparison helpers and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old employee records to the new schema by adding a designation field defaulting to #other.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to changed frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling use.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gating, profile setup enforcement, and global theming for the React app.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: A dialog for recording employee attendance, handling working status, check-in/out times, and submitting data via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A dialog prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Form dialog for adding a new employee with fields for ID, name, designation, location, type, project, and photo.
Displays an employee's photo or a fallback icon, loading the image from an ExternalBlob.
Handles image upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and returns an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation, user greeting, authentication button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: React card component that displays and lets admins edit the daily overtime hours threshold using query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, employee, authorization, and attendance data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining color variables and styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing employees, attendance status, filters, and overtime threshold with admin entry controls.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeProfilePage.t: Displays an employee’s profile, fetching data by ID and rendering photo, personal info, and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Lists employees with search and filtering, allowing admins to add new employees via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyReportPage.tsx: Shows monthly attendance reports with filtering and supports admin‑only CSV export.
frontend/src/utils/designation.ts: Maps designation enums to readable labels and provides a sorted list of all options.
frontend/src/utils/downloadCsv.ts: Creates and triggers a browser download for CSV content using a Blob link.
frontend/src/utils/formatDate.ts: Formats ISO dates into a day‑month‑year string with weekday abbreviation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and removing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the attendance app’s state, features, requirements, known issues, and reporting rules for Kuwait/Saudi employee workflows.
